attributes.action: I want to get Portland Hospital Dorset to be open again.
attributes.additional_details: I would like to see Portland Hospital open for the portlanders would be great to have it as a Nightingale Hospital we have Portland port with navy ships in the harbour and the Helicopter pad which is used quite a lot for Navy and Army Air Ambulance if needed plus the police so it's a great location. This would free up our Weymouth and Dorchester Hospitals more for emergencies plus Portland people would not have to come of the Ireland I'm afraid if accidents on Beach Road stuck in traffic will miss there appointment I have the backing of Portland Councillor Giovanna Lewis.
attributes.background: Portland Hospital is a great Hospital have used it so many times, As can't get appointment at our surgery as so busy you can wait weeks for appointment, So we could go to the minor injuries unit which is a bus ride down or taxi .

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. Decisions on how particular hospitals are used is a matter for the NHS and individual trusts.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

www.gov.uk/coronavirus
https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

The Government has also created an online service to help you find out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips

You can read impartial analysis of the Government response to coronavirus and policy developments here: https://commonslibrary.parliament.uk/coronavirus/

You may also be interested to know that because of the large number of petitions that have been started in relation to coronavirus, the Petitions Committee has been questioning the Government about its response to the coronavirus outbreak.

Find out more: https://committees.parliament.uk/work/192/the-governments-response-to-coronavirus/
